statements.statement: INSERT INTO tb_issue_list (company_cd, issue_no, issue_loc, mater_cd, issue_qty, issue_date, issue_desc, unit, area_cd, div_cd, block_cd, block_cd2, year_cd, tm_tbm, posting_date, werks, status, regid, regdate, regtime, modid, moddate, modtime, cost_center, attr1, attr2 ) VALUES ( ${companyCd}, ${issueNo}, ${issueLoc}, ${materCd}, ${issueQty}, ${issueDate}, ${desc}, ${MEINS}, ${areaCd}, ${divCd}, ${blockCd}, ${blockCd2}, ${yearCd}, ${tmTbm}, ${postingDate}, (SELECT DETAIL_CD FROM TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND GROUP_CD = '2008' ), '02', -- XI 전송 ${userId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${userId}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'HH24MISS'), ${costCenter}, ${attr1}, ${attr2} )
SELECT * FROM TB_MATER_INFO WHERE MATER_CD = ${materCd} AND USEYN = 'Y'

SELECT (TO_CHAR( sysdate, 'yyyymm' ) || LPAD( TO_CHAR( NVL( SUBSTR( MAX( issue_no ), 7 ), '0' ) + 1 ), 4, '0' )) AS ISSUE_NO FROM tb_issue_list WHERE issue_no LIKE ('%'||TO_CHAR( sysdate, 'yyyymm' )||'%')
SELECT DETAIL_CD as plant FROM TB_COMM_CD_DETAIL WHERE COMPANY_CD = ${companyCd} AND GROUP_CD = '2008'
